Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Brain Diseases/Headache Disorders/Headache Disorders, Primary/Trigeminal Autonomic Cephalalgias
Record.Description: Primary headache disorders that show symptoms caused by the activation of the AUTONOMIC NERVOUS SYSTEM of the TRIGEMINAL NERVE. These autonomic features include redness and tearing of the EYE, nasal congestion or discharge, facial SWEATING and other symptoms. Most subgroups show unilateral cranial PAIN.
